result.eng: It will rain tomorrow.

result.eng: The whole thing is making me afraid.

result.eng: Your thumb is bleeding. Put a plaster on it, for God's sake!

result.eng: Will we have to put up with this whimpering for long?

result.eng: But him playing with little boats, at his age!

result.eng: Life was getting hard for them.

result.html: Bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthuLife was getting hard for them.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an saol ag cur cruaiḋ orṫuLife was getting hard for them.

result.eng: There was no point in him opposing them.
result.ga: Ní raibh gar leis cur ina n-éadan
result.orig: Ní raibh gar leis cur ina n-éadan
result.html: Ní raibh gar leis cur ina n-éadanThere was no point in him opposing them.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ gar leis cur ina n-éadanThere was no point in him opposing them.

result.eng: Maybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ga: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.orig: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.html: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir naċ mbeaḋ sé mar seo an teaġlaċ á cur as seilḃ da mbíoḋ sé féin níos táḃaċtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.

result.eng: But he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}

result.ponchtml: Aċ ní raiḃ cur suas aige dóBut he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}

result.eng: Fear didn't allow Jamie to refuse doing it.
result.ga: Ní ligfeadh an eagla do Shéimí cur suas don obair

result.html: Ní ligfeadh an eagla do Shéimí cur suas don obairFear didn't allow Jamie to refuse doing it.

result.eng: Nothing could scare me.
result.ga: Ní raibh eagla le cur orm
result.orig: Ní raibh eagla le cur orm
result.html: Ní raibh eagla le cur ormNothing could scare me.
